text: Devine kicked off MTV's first Movie & TV Awards with a tribute to the nominated [Mrs. Potts's sing-song voice] movies and TV shows with a little help from his Workaholics bro Blake Anderson and some random celebrity friends, including Hailee Steinfeld, Mike Colter, Rebel Wilson, and the Night King from Game of Thrones. (He's a DJ when he's not terrorizing the people of Westeros.)
title: Adam Devine’s 'Beauty And The Beast' Tribute Literally Set The Movie & TV Awards On Fire

meta_data.description: The 2017 MTV Movie & TV Awards kick off with a star-studded tribute to 'Beauty and the Beast,' led by host Adam Devine.
